name: asfalis-security-scanner
description: Web-based GitHub security scanner with OAuth integration

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test -- --watchAll=false
scripts.test:coverage: cd server && npm run test:coverage && cd ../client && npm test -- --coverage --watchAll=false
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd server && npm run lint:fix && cd ../client && npm run lint:fix

author: Asfalis Security Team
